item.title: Boona Tandem Showerhead
item.description: Our Shower Got an Upgrade: The Boona Tandem Shower Head Experience Introduction When I first heard about the Boona Tandem Shower Head, it was through a meme about its Shark Tank appearance. Intrigued by the concept, I decided to give it a shot when I saw it on sale. Here’s how it changed our daily shower routine. Why We Love It Easy Installation: Seriously, it took about 10 minutes to set up.
